Row.Text: Are you sure you want to adopt [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_WritingSystemDesc}[ENDCOLOR] as your Civilization's Writing System?
Adopt [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_FontIcon} {2_WritingSystemDesc}[ENDCOLOR] as your Civilization's Writing System.
You have {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_CAPTAIN] Captains.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Gain Captains by expending Great Admirals and Great Generals.
You have {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_CLERIC] Clerics.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Gain Clerics by expending Great Prophets and when founding a Religion.
You have {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Gain Dignitaries by expending Great Dignitaries.

You have {1_Num} [ICON_JFD_INVENTOR] Inventors.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Gain Inventors by expending Great Artists, Great Directors, Great Entertainers, Great Doctors, Great Engineers, Great Merchants, Great Musicians, Great Scientists, and Great Writers.
You have {1_Num} [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Gain Magistrates by expending Great Magistrates.
